short_description_localized.en: Breakfast Package includes one breakfast entree, regular coffee, decaf, hot tea, or milk, and a choice of fruit juice. Breakfast vouchers can be used in room service - does not include delivery charge of $3.25.
short_description_localized.fr: Breakfast Package includes one breakfast entree, regular coffee, decaf, hot tea, or milk, and a choice of fruit juice. Breakfast vouchers can be used in room service - does not include delivery charge of $3.25.
short_description_localized.it: Il Pacchetto Prima Colazione include una American Breakfast entree, caffe’, caffe’ decaffeinato, the, latte ed un succo di frutta a scelta. I voucher della prima colazione possono essere utilizzati anche per ordinazioni attraverso il servizio in camera.  Un costo aggiuntivo di $3.25 per colazione e’ previsto per il servizio in camera.

image.name: Breakfast-Included---Pay-Later-Hotel-Lounge
image.caption: Hotel Lounge
image.description: Picture of the Hotel Lounge. Breakfast will be served in the Hotel Lounge. Package is including American Breakfast.
